page.title: 14FRODSHAM HARRIERS
page.content: Founded 8th April, 1972 following the successful re-introduction of the hill races, the club, catering for all ages and having a range of activities, including cross-country, road running and track and field athletics, has grown greatly. It pioneered sportshall athletics, now established in 60 counties. In winter they take part in major cross-country and road running events being members of the Cheshire League. In summer the club competes in 4 track leagues. 1. The Cheshire League- all ages. Both men's and women's teams currently in 2nd place of the 21 competing clubs. 2. Northern Women's League- team have gained promotion through the divisions in 5 successive years. 3. Northern Men's League- team is top of Division 5. The club has produced internationals, Anne Girvan and Colin Walker.
